data.title: Tesla Desperately Fights Its Already Lost Battle
data.text: I like Tesla and the vision that drives Elon Musk. Tesla's pioneering work in the EV field cannot be appreciated enough.

data.title: BMW And Tesla: Who's Better?
data.text: Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) has been a pioneer in the luxury electric vehicle market, posting robust growth over the last few years. In this analysis, we compare Tesla’s financial and operating metrics with the automotive business of the BMW Group, which is one of the largest luxury vehicle manufacturer.

data.title: Report: Tesla Might Be Expanding Its Gigafactory
data.text: Electric automaker Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) is reportedly looking to expand its China-based Gigafactory 3 facility, according to Electrek.

data.title: How Tesla CEO Elon Musk Tried to Destroy a Whistleblower
data.text: Bloomberg's Zeke Faux reports on how Elon Musk tried to ruin a whistleblower. He speaks on "Bloomberg Businessweek."
